named-query.name: permiso.get.source.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId not in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1)

named-query.name: permiso.get.target.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1)

named-query.name: rolpermisos.get.permisos.rol
named-query.query: select o from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1

named-query.name: rolpermisos.delete
named-query.query: select o from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1 and o.permiso.perId = ?2

named-query.name: marca.get.all.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Marca o where o.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: usuario.permiso.get.source.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1) and o.perId not in (select o2.permiso.perId from UsuarioPermiso o2 where o2.rol.rolId=?1 and o2.usuario.usuId=?2)

named-query.name: usuario.permiso.get.target.list
named-query.query: select o from Permiso o where o.perId in (select o.permiso.perId from RolPermiso o where o.rol.rolId = ?1) and o.perId in (select o2.permiso.perId from UsuarioPermiso o2 where o2.rol.rolId=?1 and o2.usuario.usuId=?2)

named-query.name: usuario.permiso.delete
named-query.query: select o from UsuarioPermiso o where o.usuario.usuId=?1 and o.rol.rolId=?2
